dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Studio Presse
dmca.body:
Google Inc. 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway 
Mountain View CA 94043 US
 
FAX: (650) 618-2680 
Attn: Blogger Legal Support,
DMCA complaints 

Paris, November 16, 2006
 
Copyright infringement

Sir,

We ask you to immediately shut down the blog: http://gayarabs.blogspot.com/ The owner of this blog has committed copyright infringement. He is using copyright protected videos and photo material we own, without our permission.
 
STUDIOPRESSE company is the owner of WWW.CITEBEUR.COM website. The blog http://gayarabs.blogspot.com/ presents pictures and videos taken from WWW.CITEBEUR.COM. You can clearly see on these pictures & videos our watermark logo.

We state that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner (which is our 
company), by our agents, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is 
accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
We expect to have a prompt response from you to our request. StudioPresse takes very seriously copyright infringement of our photo and video material, and we will make all effort to stop it, including filling legal lawsuit against hosting companies.

Ocean Aletheia 
Technical manager 
studio@studiopresse.com
webmaster@citebeur.com
